login_logo: Log in with your digital wallet
qrCodeValidInfo: The QR code is valid for {{seconds}} seconds
supportText: Use the IT-Wallet app feature or your smartphone camera
qrCodeExpiredInfo: The QR code has expired, reload the page to generate a new one.
appText: To continue, follow the instructions on the app and authorize access
failureTitle: We were unable to retrieve your data
failureText: Remember that to log in with IT-Wallet, you must consent to the reading of your information. If the problem persist, please contact the support service.
